abstract: Chicago Teachers Union rejects contract proposal because it failed to address school conditions, student services and long-term financial crisis.
lead_paragraph: The Chicago Teachers Union said Monday that it had rejected a contract proposal because it did not address school conditions, lack of services to some students and a long-term fiscal crisis.

headline.main: Illinois: Chicago Teachers Reject Contract Offer
headline.print_headline: Illinois: Chicago Teachers Reject Contract Offer

snippet: The Chicago Teachers Union said Monday that it had rejected a contract proposal because it did not address school conditions, lack of services to some students and a long-term fiscal crisis.
